extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected System and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the system is affected by the vulnerability by verifying the installed FortiOS or FortiProxy version.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system affected by the vulnerability?

extracted_playbook.title: Upgrade FortiOS & FortiProxy
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade FortiOS & FortiProxy products to the recommended versions to mitigate the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Workaround for FortiOS
extracted_playbook.description: Disable HTTP/HTTPS administrative interface or limit IP addresses that can reach the administrative interface. Create an Address Group, then create the Local in Policy to restrict access only to the predefined group on management interface.
